title: Habify
subtitle: Habify: Habit & Task Manager
description: A productivity app designed to help users build habits and manage daily tasks with reminders, progress tracking, and motivation features.
features: Habit tracking and scheduling with reminders
Cloud-based database and account system for multi-device sync
App widget, customizable themes, and reminders for better accessibility

title: Lofigram
subtitle: Lofigram: Your Calm Space
description: A serene lofi music and sound platform designed to help users relax, focus, and unwind with curated playlists, timers, and mindful screensavers.
features: Lofi music streaming with category personalization
Favorites, downloads, and offline listening for premium users
Sleep timer, Pomodoro focus mode, and customizable screensaver
Global chat with anonymous mode and integrated AI bot
